TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MemberCodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase
Public MustInherit Class MemberCodeDomSerializer Inherits CodeDomSerializerBase

summary.span: 提供基底類別，以序列化物件 Graph 內的基本反映。

span.span: Provides the base class for serializing a reflection primitive within the object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是 「 中繼 」 序列化程式，亦即，不會序列化物件圖形的一部分，但改為將序列化物件圖形內的基本反映的序列化程式。The class is a "meta" serializer; that is, is a serializer that does not serialize part of the object graph, but instead serializes a reflection primitive within the object graph. 例如，會與相關聯，才能讓它序列化屬性。For example, a would be associated with a in order for it to serialize a property. 物件啟用建構，例如屬性和事件，是邏輯，而不需要他們在程式碼中有實體的支援。 objects enable constructs, such as properties and events, to be logical, rather than requiring them to have a physical backing in code. 不同於類別，物件必須要能夠還原序列化。Unlike classes, objects must be able to deserialize.

The object to which the member is bound.

param.span: 要序列化的成員描述項。

summary.span: 將指定值上的指定成員描述項序列化為陳述式集合。

span.span: Serializes the given member descriptor on the given value to a statement collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實際執行序列化。This method actually performs the serialization. 序列化的成員時所需的陳述式會加入陳述式集合。When the member is serialized the necessary statements will be added to the statements collection.

span.span: , if the member described by should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回`true`如果應該序列化指定的成員描述元，或`false`如果不需要序列化的成員。This method returns `true` if the given member descriptor should be serialized, or `false` if there is no need to serialize the member.
